item.title: Groove Dye Unisex Shirt – Green
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Green tie and dye casual shirt made of 100% cotton has spread collar button plackets, long regular sleeves
item.content:encoded:
Green tie and dye casual shirt made of 100% cotton has spread collar button plackets, long regular sleeves

These unisex shirts are crafted from 100% premium cotton, ensuring superior comfort, breathability, and durability. shirts feature a vibrant and dynamic tie and dye design that embodies a free-spirited aesthetic, Due to the nature of tie and dye, the shirts may have a slightly uneven texture and color distribution

These shirts are designed to offer a relaxed, unisex fit, making them suitable for wear by people of all genders and body types.

The silhouette is slightly loose, providing comfort and ease of movement.

The shirt features a classic crew neck collar and long sleeves offering different styling possibilities.

item.description: Standard sized daily wear Sarees made of 100% cotton with tie and dye design details and cotton tassels

Cotton-blend fabric. Textured fabric. Long design. Evasé design.

MATERIAL AND WASHING INSTRUCTIONS

Composition: 100% cotton
